Windlord::

"Grounded this is Windlord"said the male by comm link while he flew 
over the battle"What's the situation here?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
> Grounded popped out of the ground right behind Lokk.  He sent a 
comm 
> link.  "This is Grounded. Split the fork and choose a pea." he said 
> hoping Lokk would understand his code.  He then went beside Lokk in 
his 
> mole form walking slowly and stealthly behind him.  Using 
vibrations 
> through the ground he determined within a few some odd yards they 
would 
> be directly behind the enemy.
> 
> gunthers8@n... wrote:
> 
> > Seekker ran up to the pod diving behind it rolling along the 
ground
> > until beside Axis.  He looks both ways then up and down.  Now 
looking at
> > Axis stares him in the eyes. The small bot grabs at Axis face 
with both
> > hands.  "THIS IS WAR BOY.  THIS ISN'T YOUR PANSY ACCADEMY 
TRAINING, THIS
> > IS THE REAL THING.  NOW LITSEN TO ME, PRIVATE, I WANT YOU TO GET 
OUT
> > THERE AND SHOW THOSE ENEMY'S HOW FAR OVER THE LINE THEY ARE.  YOU 
GOT
> > THAT YOU PIECE OF PRIVATE PISTONS." he yelled at Axis believeing 
he
> > himself was a war general.  He then looked straigh back from the 
pod.
> > "Bring it on..." he said.  He then turned jumping up onto the top 
of the
> > pod, his two miniguns under each arm ringing out 20 shots each.  
Both
> > his hands carried small explosive grenades. Throwing one at 
Barrymore
> > and the other at McGowan.  The crazy shots from his minigun fly 
toward
> > McGowan, Barrymore, Stiller and Alba in very bad accuracy. "HAR 
HAR. YOU
> > REBELS WILL LEARN A LESSON, SEEKKER STYLE"  Seekker still stood 
atop the
> > pod.
> > 
> > rauq@t... wrote:
> > 
> >  > --- Lokk / Axis / Lynxiz ---
> >  >
> >  > Lynxiz quickly flattens herself to the ground, avoiding most 
of the
> >  > wildly fired shots though in her dodging efforts, several 
bullets dug
> >  > into her armour, and glanced off of her back. She stays on the
> >  > ground, and notices Nightlight being approached by Depp. A
> >  > growing sense of doom builds as she gets to her feet and fires 
two
> >  > disks at Depp. Immediately after firing the disks, she puts 
her gun
> >  > away and starts to sprint towards Depp thinking, <<I can't let 
this
> >  > happen...>> as she prepares for close combat mode. Her claws
> >  > extend from her hands with a metallic ringing.
> >  >
> >  > Axis, not sure what to do, waits behind the pod, hoping that 
the
> >  > heavy heat resistant re-entry armour on the pod will hold out 
for this
> >  > battle. Without looking, he yells, "LOKK?" Wanting to make sure
> >  > that Lokk is ok.
> >  >
> >  > Lokk creaps around, weaving through trees. Exiting the forest, 
he
> >  > hids behind a near by rock. Keeping low to the ground, he 
crawls
> >  > along still trying to get behind the enemy and he's almost 
there.
